result.title: TMCOTEAM
result.content: Hello, Codeforces community! If you are not/were not part of Turkmenistan's Olimp team, probably this post, won't bother you.. For those who are/were, however, now it's just WERE. I mean now, "OLYMP CENTER" is closed. I'm sorry for all of our students, as I were olso part of it. Last hope is that our "Olympic guys" will be still sticked together, but for now we are on our own...
